title: Stop Using Range(Len)
Lambda Functions: One-Liners
script: Need a quick function? Lambdas are your friend! Define functions inline, perfect for short operations. Assign it to a variable for reuse!

title: Enumerate Like a Pro
script: Stop manually tracking indices! Enumerate gives you both the index and value in a loop. Cleaner code, fewer errors. So efficient!

title: Zip Multiple Iterables
code_snippet: for a, b in zip(list1, list2):
script: Combine lists element-wise with zip! Iterate through multiple lists simultaneously. Great for parallel processing. Zip it up!

title: Collections Counter Magic
code_snippet: from collections import Counter; counts = Counter(my_list)
script: Need to count item occurrences? Collections Counter does it instantly! Find most common elements, frequency analysis made easy. Import Counter and go!
